metadata.title: Benthic Cores from the Eastern Bering Sea Shelf

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries
Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)

metadata.description:
Two cores for shipboard incubations from each of 20 to 30 stations during July and September 1999, using the HAPS benthic corer.
  An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data to support NPMR Project "Measure denitrification rates in surface sediments of the Bering continental shelf."

Status: Planned

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
